title.rendered: SCAM DISCLAIMER – COSCHARIS MOBILITY AIRLINE NIGERIA LIMITED

content.rendered:
It has come to our attention that Coscharis Group is purportedly running an online vacancy advertisement for recruitment to a fictitious Coscharis Mobility Airline Nigeria Limited.

Please note:

  • that Coscharis Group does not have any such subsidiary
  • would only communicate its career opportunities via its website or newspaper publications
  • should be contacted directly to confirm any such information in future

Consequently, Coscharis Group will not be responsible to anyone acting on an employment offer or other transaction not directly made or confirmed by it

Coscharis Group reserves the right to take legal action, including criminal action against such individuals/entities

 

Best Regards,

 

Signed:

For Coscharis Group

 

Chito Ndubuisi                                                  Abiona Babarinde

Company Secretary                                        GM, Marketing and Corporate Communications

Coscharis Group                                              Coscharis Group
